success.description: Indicates whether the API request was successful (true) or failed (false).

data.description: The response payload. Present on successful responses (success: true).

error.description: Error message for simple error responses. Used in some legacy endpoints.

errors.description: Array of error objects for detailed error responses. Present on error responses (success: false).

field.description: The field that caused the error (for validation errors).

description: Generic wrapper object for API responses. Success responses contain 'data', while error responses contain 'errors' array or 'error' string.
